name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter bread, place cheese between slices, grill until golden.

name: Tomato Pasta
instructions: Boil pasta, toss with tomato sauce and olive oil.

name: PB&J Sandwich
instructions: Spread peanut butter and jelly on bread slices, combine.

name: Omelette
instructions: Beat eggs and milk, cook in pan, add cheese before folding.

name: Naan Pizza
instructions: Spread sauce on naan, add cheese, bake at 425Â°F for 10 min.

name: Fried Rice
instructions: Fry rice with soy sauce and scrambled eggs.

name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Mash avocado, spread on toasted bread, sprinkle salt.

name: Scrambled Eggs
instructions: Whisk eggs with milk, cook with butter, stir until soft.

name: Salad Bowl
instructions: Chop veggies, toss with olive oil.

name: Pasta Carbonara
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions. While hot, mix with beaten eggs, grated cheese, and butter. The heat from the pasta will cook the eggs into a creamy sauce.

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Chop romaine lettuce and place in a bowl. Cut bread into cubes and toast for croutons. Toss lettuce with croutons, grated cheese, and Caesar dressing.

name: Strawberry Banana Smoothie
instructions: Peel banana and add to blender with milk and strawberries. Blend until smooth and creamy. Add ice if desired.

name: Butter Naan
instructions: Warm naan bread in a pan or oven. Brush generously with melted butter while still hot. Serve immediately.

name: Egg Salad
instructions: Boil eggs, peel, and chop. Mix with mayo and seasoning. Serve on lettuce leaves or bread.

name: Rice Bowl
instructions: Cook rice and place in a bowl. Top with sliced avocado and drizzle with soy sauce. Add sesame seeds if desired.
